6830/A0/04/002/006.indicator_name: Number of new laws and regulations regarding child protection developed
6830/A0/04/002/006.headline: Family law has been revised to harmonize the national legislation with CRC. Child rights with regard to marriage  birth registration or those employed as domestic workers have been improved. The law is following the established approval process.
